mapper.insert:
insert into
( ID, PRODUCT_ID, GROUP_ID, CHANNEL_ID, UA, STAT_DATE, CREATE_TIME, TOTAL_NUM, VALID_NUM ) values ( #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{productId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{channelId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{ua,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{totalNum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{validNum,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
